title: Haviland 2724 Duo-Dri Foam Rubber Heavy Duty Floor Squeegee, 24" Length
features: Good for acid, alkali, scuff, ozone and sunlight resistance, animal and vegetable oils, high temperatures
Fair for degreasers and petroleum products
description: Socket for cast aluminum. Rubber for Duo-Dri in gray foam. Cleanup for soap and water or citric cleaner. Primary uses for food service areas, hard-to-dry areas, grouted and quarry tile floors. 16 Gauge straight plated steel. Excellent for low temperatures. Good for acid, alkali, scuff, ozone and sunlight resistance, animal and vegetable oils, high temperatures. Fair for degreasers and petroleum products. Poor for solvents, abrasion resistance. 24" Straight length.
